name: Observation result status
description: HL7-defined table specifying the current completion status of observation results

values.description: Record coming over is a correction and thus replaces a final result
values.definition: Correction to previously reported final results

values.description: Final results; Can only be changed with a corrected result.
values.definition: Final validated results that have been verified

values.description: Not asked; used to affirmatively document that the observation identified in the OBX was not sought when the universal service ID in OBR-4 implies that it would be sought.
values.definition: Test was not requested as part of the ordered panel
Descriptive information only, no numeric result
Initial results requiring verification before final release
Results have been entered but not yet verified
Some but not all results are available

values.description: Results status change to final without retransmitting results already sent as 'preliminary.'
values.definition: Status updated to final, no result value changes

values.description: Verified - Final results reviewed and confirmed to be correct, no change to result value, normal range or abnormal flag
values.definition: Results have been verified by qualified personnel

values.description: Results cannot be obtained for this observation
values.definition: Unable to perform test or obtain results
